import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
source.03783b2e:
fig=plt.figure()
ax=fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
them=plt.get_cmap('magma')
ax.bar(blood, fr, color='#ad118e')
ax.set_title('Blood Type Table', size=30, y=1.1)
ax.set_xlabel('Blood Type', size=15)
ax.set_ylabel('Frequency of observations', size=15)
plt.show()
source.ff13e63b:
colors=['#10c2bf', '#db18ed', '#1866ed', '#ed3118']
plt.pie(fr, labels=blood, colors=colors, explode=(0.05,0.05,0.05,0.05), shadow=True ,autopct='%0.1f%%', 
        radius =2,textprops={'fontsize':15},)
plt.title('Blood Type Frequency', y=1.4, fontsize=15, color='b')
plt.legend(loc='upper right', bbox_to_anchor=(2, 1.5), fontsize='x-large')
plt.show()
source.6b755089:
x = [5,7,8,7,2,17,2,9,4,11,12,9,6]
y = [99,86,87,88,111,86,103,87,94,78,77,85,86]

fig = plt.figure()
ax = fig.add_axes([0,0,1,1])
ax.scatter(x, y)
ax.set_title('X vs Y', size=20, y=1.1, color='r')
ax.set_xlabel('X', size=15 )
ax.set_ylabel('Y', size=15 )
plt.show()

ax.hist(a)
